mapper.insert: insert into book (bookTitle, author, type, publisher, pubYear, imagePath, bookQty) values(#{bookTitle}, #{author}, #{type}, #{publisher}, #{pubYear}, #{imagePath}, #{bookQty})
mapper.select: select bookCode, bookQty from book where bookTitle=#{bookTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into bookstatus (bookNo, bookCode, rentStatus, reserveStatus) values(#{bookNo}, #{bookCode}, 2, 0)
